H3.text: when did the united states acquired puerto rico. 1898

A4.text: The war formally ended with the 1898 Treaty of Paris, signed on December 10 with terms favorable to the U.S. The treaty ceded ownership of Puerto Rico, Guam, and the Philippines to the U.S.

A5.text: Hostilities were halted on August 12, 1898, with the signing in Washington of a Protocol of Peace between the United States and Spain. ... Spain relinquished its sovereignty over Puerto Rico.
